name: Candy Little Monster: Brick Breaker Free
name_original: Candy Little Monster: Brick Breaker Free
description:
The little monster is hungry! He loves candy!
Help it to eat as many candies as possible and earn points!

This game reminds a classic arcade game, but with a cute theme!

How to Play?
- Use the trampoline to boost the little monster to the candies.
- Help the little monster eat all the candies.
- Collect power-ups that will help you.
- Dodge the power-downs, that can hinder you.
